title: Gamemax GCR07 Gaming Chair Red

full_description:
Gamemax GCR07 Gaming Chair Red

Gamemax GCR07 Red Gaming Chair is a relaxing gaming chair by GameMax. Nitro Concepts with soft and extra thick cold foam upholstery with 100% vegan PU artificial leather cover. The rear of the backrest with a carbon look is very gorgeous and attractive. it comes with fixed armrests with extra soft cushioning for a comfortable experience. It offers a safety class 4 gas lift with a top-notch rocking mechanism up to 15°. It has a rocking mechanism & 50 mm casters and an 80mm Class4 gas lift with a dust cover. The 350mm base is made of nylon. All in all the Gamemax GCR07 gaming chair is very comfortable. It has no warranty.

values.value: 100% vegan PU artificial leather, nylon, steel
